name: Katadyn BeFree Microfilter with Hydrapak 3.0L
description: Let gravity do the work for you. This lightweight water filtration system uses Katadyn’s fast-flowing BeFree filter to provide clean, safe drinking water for you and your group. A simple shake or swish to cleans out the filter, no back-flushing or scrubbing required. When it's empty, it collapses to free up space in your pack.BeFree™ 0.1 micron microfilter removes harmful bacteria and cysts.Filter has a fast flow rate and is easy to clean without back-flushing or special tools.Body is 0.4mm thermoplastic polyurethane.Front bail handle and rear carrying handle make filling and transport easy.Materials are free of BPA and PVC.Meets or exceeds FDA and EU regulations.Do not allow the cartridge to freeze after initial use.
